Certificate of Incorporation.title: CERTIFICATE OF INCORPORATION
Memorandum & Articles of Association.des: This document sets out the constitution of John LLC, a private company limited by shares, incorporated in Mauritius.
List of Directors.title: LIST OF DIRECTORS
Shareholders \/ UBO Declaration.title: SHAREHOLDERS / UBO DECLARATION
Shareholders \/ UBO Declaration.confirma: I confirm that John Doe is the ultimate beneficial owner (UBO) of the entity.
Authorized Signatory List (ASL).title: AUTHORIZED SIGNATORY LIST
UBO Declaration.title: UBO DECLARATION
UBO Declaration.ubo.name: John Doe
FATCA \/ CRS Self-Certification.title: FATCA / CRS SELF-CERTIFICATION
FATCA \/ CRS Self-Certification.complian: I certify that John LLC complies with FATCA and CRS requirements.
Board Resolution to Invest in AIF.title: BOARD RESOLUTION TO INVEST
Board Resolution to Invest in AIF.resolu: Resolved that John LLC is authorized to invest in Alternative Investment Funds (AIFs) in India.
Board Resolution to Invest in AIF.furthe: Resolved further that John Doe is authorized to execute any related documentation.
Board Resolution to Invest in AIF.author: John Doe
Source of Funds Declaration.title: SOURCE OF FUNDS DECLARATION
Source of Funds Declaration.declaration: I, John Doe, declare that funds invested by John LLC originate from lawful business operations and are free from any criminal activity.
PEP Declaration.title: PEP DECLARATION
PEP Declaration.declaration: I, John Doe, declare that I am not a Politically Exposed Person (PEP) as defined by FATF guidelines.
AML Policy Confirmation.title: AML POLICY CONFIRMATION
AML Policy Confirmation.confirmation: I, John Doe, confirm that John LLC maintains an Anti-Money Laundering (AML) policy in compliance with Mauritian laws.
